title: Contrast
additional-notes: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

We are not sure whether the renewed copyright for Erskine Caldwell's 'Fodder and Fondue in Fiction', mentioned as appearing in the March 1963 issue of Contrast, appeared in this serial or in another serial that had the same title.  In any case, it is the only active contribution renewal recorded for any periodical titled Contrast.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Iren Sokolova for copyright research on this title.
